title: Calories in Buffalo Wings
meta_description: Discover calories in buffalo wings for a standard serving of 6, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and tips for variations to fit your diet.
assumptions: Bone-in chicken wings with skin, fried, coated in buffalo sauce; average size (~35g meat per wing); no sides or dips included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, frying method, sauce spiciness, wing size, and added ingredients. Check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 6 buffalo wings contains about 600 kcal, with high fat and sodium from the skin and sauce.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Baked instead of fried (reduces oil absorption)
Add 1 oz blue cheese dressing to serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one buffalo wing?
faqs.a: About 100 kcal per wing, depending on size and preparation.

faqs.q: Are buffalo wings high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 6 wings provide ~36 g protein, mainly from the chicken.

faqs.q: Calories in baked vs. fried buffalo wings?
